traits.name: Mountain Born
entries: The goliath is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

traits.name: Powerful Build
entries: The goliath counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The goliath makes two attacks with its greataxe or hurls two javelins.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
